selections.name: Jambalaya
selections.reason: Consistent performer who maps perfectly from barrier 2. With James McDonald aboard and solid form in this grade, he rates highly.

selections.name: Shaggy
selections.reason: Racing in great heart with a win and a second in last two starts. Handles the conditions and draws well.

selections.name: Los Padres
selections.reason: Coming off a last-start win and has excellent stats on soft ground (10: 2-0-2). The wet track brings him right into contention.

selections.name: Zoutastic
selections.reason: Consistent mare who rarely runs a bad race. Handles the sting out of the ground.

danger_horse.name: Shaggy
danger_horse.reason: In peak form and represents the main threat if the top pick finds trouble.

selections.name: Brave Xena
selections.reason: Unbeaten in two starts and looks a progressive type. Handles the wet (1:1-0-0 on heavy) and gets in light.

selections.name: Sir Franklin
selections.reason: Resuming here but has excellent fresh stats and loves soft going (5:3-2-0). Drawn to get a soft run.

selections.name: Zampano
selections.reason: Trial winner leading in. Tommy Berry takes the ride, which is a strong push from the stable.

selections.name: Tough Guy
selections.reason: Another resuming runner with good fresh form. Won a trial recently and rates a chance.

danger_horse.name: Sir Franklin
danger_horse.reason: Proven wet tracker who could simply be too classy if ready to go.

exotic_strategy.strategy: Each Way #17. Boxed Quinella 1, 7, 17. Wide Trifecta.

selections.name: Bear On The Loose
selections.reason: Third-up and ready to peak. Ran well last start and the step up to 2000m is ideal. Maps to get a lovely run.

selections.name: Don Diego De Vega
selections.reason: Class runner of the field. Trialled well recently and has the ability to overcome the wide gate.

selections.name: Golden Century
selections.reason: Resuming with J-Mac aboard. Has a good fresh record and stays all day.

selections.name: Mr Monaco
selections.reason: Consistent type who draws the rails. Will be in it for a long way.

danger_horse.name: Don Diego De Vega
danger_horse.reason: High class import who could blow these away if near his best.

selections.name: Spicy Miss
selections.reason: Strong form lines in Group company. Second in the Golden Gift and looks well-placed here.

selections.name: Ciaron's Star
selections.reason: Won well last start at this track. Progressive filly who is on an upward spiral.

selections.name: By Choice
selections.reason: Group 2 placed filly. Has the class edge but gives weight away.

selections.name: Pembrey
selections.reason: Won impressively on debut. Takes a step up in grade but looks talented.

danger_horse.name: Ciaron's Star
danger_horse.reason: Hard to knock a last start winner at the track.

selections.name: Fireball
selections.reason: Impressive winner last start. Looks the one to beat despite the wide draw with J-Mac sticking.

selections.name: Warwoven
selections.reason: Unbeaten in two starts. Drawn the rails and will make his own luck.

selections.name: Knightsbridge
selections.reason: Better than recent form suggests. Can improve sharply here.

selections.name: Star Of Jamaica
selections.reason: Consistent performer who should be running on late.

danger_horse.name: Warwoven
danger_horse.reason: Undefeated horses are always dangerous, especially from barrier 1.

selections.name: Manaal
selections.reason: Group 1 quality mare. Second last start was excellent and she is the clear class runner.

selections.name: Firestorm
selections.reason: Resuming. J-Mac takes the ride and she has good fresh stats. Drawn to get the run of the race.

selections.name: Verona Rose
selections.reason: Consistent mare who is rarely far away. Place chance.

selections.name: Jenni The Fox
selections.reason: Racing well and steps up to a suitable trip.

selections.name: Tempted
selections.reason: Won the G3 Esk Prince last start. Maps perfectly from barrier 2 and is the one to beat.

selections.name: Savvy Hallie
selections.reason: Defeated Apocalyptic last start. In winning form and must be respected.

selections.name: Apocalyptic
selections.reason: Runner-up to Savvy Hallie last time. Meets her better at the weights here.

selections.name: Ole Dancer
selections.reason: Victorian raider with strong form. Watch betting.

selections.name: Autumn Glow
selections.reason: Star filly who was dominant last start. Looks to have a class edge on this field.

selections.name: Ceolwulf
selections.reason: Group 1 winner who will be fitter for recent racing. The main danger.

selections.name: Aeliana
selections.reason: Chased hard behind Autumn Glow last time. Drawn well but has to turn the tables.

selections.name: Lindermann
selections.reason: Likely leader who will give a sight if allowed to dictate.

selections.name: Willaidow
selections.reason: Won the G3 Japan Racing Plate last start. Drops in weight and is in peak form.

selections.name: Militarize
selections.reason: Class runner resuming. J-Mac rides and trials have been solid.

selections.name: Coal Crusher
selections.reason: Tough on-pacer who will be in this for a long way. Loves Randwick.

selections.name: King Of Roseau
selections.reason: Last start winner who is racing in great heart.

danger_horse.name: Militarize
danger_horse.reason: Multiple G1 winner who has the class to win fresh.

selections.name: Gatsby's
selections.reason: Ran well for second last start. Looks ready to win in this grade.

selections.name: Roselyn's Star
selections.reason: Fast horse who will look to cross and lead. Hard to catch if he gets a break.

selections.name: Mal Coupe
selections.reason: Last start winner who drops in weight. J-Mac sticks.

selections.name: Eye Of The Fire
selections.reason: Consistent type who is rarely far away. Place chance.

danger_horse.name: Roselyn's Star
danger_horse.reason: Pace influence who could steal it.
